## E_PAR_OUT_OF_RANGE

Thrown when a parameter is not within a valid range of values.

Error object:

| Attribute | Value |
| --- | --- |
| code | `E_PAR_OUT_OF_RANGE` |
| name | Name of the invalid parameter |
| value | Invalid value |
| minimum | Minimum value of the valid range |
| maximum | Maximum value of the valid range |
